response.overview: Kyle and Megghan are just like everyone else. They want to be rich, they hate the monotony of their life and they envy the rich that spend their days dawdling around the local county club. So, after breaking and entering said country club and finding out about its true secret, they commandeer a book that changes their lives forever. Megghan gets her dream restaurant and Kyle is at the top of his game at the law firm. Seemingly, it does not work. Then slowly, Megghan begins to have strange cravings that turn into uncontrollable urges. Things start to go a bit unexpected when Kyle's co-worker Julie comes over for dinner.
response.title: Let Them Eat
